body_text: Currently, the login page for the control interface lives outside of the client-side control app. We should instead make APIs to support authenticating and implement the login in the client. From a user's perspective it should otherwise function identically to how it does now.

title: Client-side login page
body: Currently, the login page for the control interface lives outside of the client-side control app. We should instead make APIs to support authenticating and implement the login in the client. From a user's perspective it should otherwise function identically to how it does now.
